intro_text: r_c looks at the small watering hole they pass by on the way to mark the border, and debates if they should stop for a quick swim to cool off.
decline_text: r_c decides to continue with the patrol instead.
success_text: They stop to swim for a few moments and feel rejuvenated, cooled and ready to continue.
They keep going, responsibly, although r_c wades through the watering hole as they do, letting the water cool their paws pleasantly.
fail_text: They get distracted while splashing in the water. r_c swears they saw a fish, but it derails their border patrol completely and they get nothing done.
